passes.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

none.message: Only one role value used

Abstract roles are not used

ARIA role is not deprecated

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > header:nth-child(9) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2
html > body > main:nth-child(10) > article > div > div > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(10) > article > div > div > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(10) > article > div > div > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(10) > article > div > div > section:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div > h5:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid
